Algorithms

Class Dijkstra

  • java.lang.Object
    • Algorithms.Dijkstra

  • public class Dijkstra
extends java.lang.Object
    Main Algorithm class Input: a graph whose nodes are sorted in ascending order according to indexes, where the source node is numbered at 0 ant the targeted node is numbered at graph size -1 Output: the input graph when its nodes are initialized with a minimum distance from the source and the shortest way to it Uses Dijkstra's algorithm
    Author:
    Chen and Inna
